title: "Sky-High Scenery"
content:
# Sky-High Scenery

Welcome to Sky-High Scenery, a website dedicated to showcasing breathtaking views of mountain ranges against clear blue skies. 

Our collection of wallpapers features stunning landscapes from around the world, each carefully selected for their awe-inspiring beauty and natural majesty. 

Whether you're looking to spruce up your desktop background or simply need a moment of visual inspiration, our high-quality images are sure to transport you to new heights. 

Join us on a journey through some of the most spectacular vistas on earth, and discover the wonder and serenity of nature at its finest.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A mountain range with a clear blue sky"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
